features.age_desc: It's not just multiplying by 7. Based on AVMA guidelines, we calculate accurate human age for small dogs, large dogs, and cats.
features.bcs_desc: Based on WSAVA's 9-point BCS chart, we analyze your pet's body type and suggest ideal weight.
features.calorie_desc: Using the RER formula, we provide customized daily calorie intake based on activity level and neutering status.

article.title: Why is Pet Obesity Management Important?
article.p1: Studies show that pets at an ideal weight live 2 years longer on average. Obesity causes arthritis, diabetes, and heart disease.
article.bcs_p: BCS is a body condition score from 1 (thin) to 9 (obese). Steps 4-5 are ideal.
article.food_p: Feeding guides on packages are averages. Indoor pets often need less.

landing.disclaimer: This service provides veterinary reference data but does replace professional diagnosis.
